member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_D3D11_OPTIONS3
member.summary: Describes Direct3D 11.3 feature options in the current graphics driver.

member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_D3D11_OPTIONS3.VPAndRTArrayIndexFromAnyShaderFeedingRasterizer
member.summary: Whether to use the VP and RT array index from any shader feeding the rasterizer.
